div.p: ⳨ The dispute about . . . on the 20th of the month of Choiak to the . . . . . . . [your] eminence the judgments(?) and . . . set in motion in sum . . . to state; but since God has granted . . . the proper procedure against(?) Hypatios the gloriosissimus(?). . . to send out to the queen of cities (i.e. Constantinople) . . . .
[To . . .] † Athanasios, your scholastikos by the grace of God.
